item.description:
Fellow Foodie Jumbos,

Boston Restaurant week is basically the last two weeks in
March and we are going celebrate by enjoying a wonderful meal at Bistro 5 in West Medford for just $38.13 plus tip and drinks. Bistro 5 is offering a great three course dinner menu:

Appetizers

Eggplant Tower: Breaded Eggplant Layered with Goat Cheese and
Kimball Farm Heirloom Tomato Sauce

Calamari: Semolina-Coated Fried Squid with Sweet & Spicy, Tomato
Chutney, and Lemon Aioli

House Cured Meats Salumi: Duck, Boar and Berkshire Pork Loin
Prosciuttos with Foie Gras Mousse and Pear Sorbet

Warm Golden Beets: Herbed Goat Cheese, Black Truffle Coulis and
Honey

Mixed Greens: Radishes, Cucumbers, and Basil Sherry Vinaigrette

Entrees

Spaghetti alla Chitarra: Squid Ink and Saffron Spaghetti, Clams,
Calamari, Baby Octopus, Capers, Green Olives and Plum Tomatoes

Barn Raised Veal Milanese: Pistachio-Panko Bread Crumbs, Garlic
Mashed Potatoes, Porcini Demi and Zucchini

Painted Hill Farm NY Strip Loin $10 supplement, Fingerling
Potato Chips, Asparagus, Smoked Sea Salt, and Cabernet-Rosemary Sauce

Grilled Free Range Chicken: Herbed Breast and Boneless Leg, Baby
Carrots, Spinach with a Roasted Garlic & Black Olive Sauce

Dessert

Creme Brulee Duo: Vanilla Bean & Espresso

Flourless Chocolate Cake: Chocolate Mousse, Caramel-Ginger Ice
Cream & Orange Candy

Cortland Apple Torta: Caramel, Coriander Shell and Vanilla
Whiskey Gelato
item.name: Jumbo Dinner: Bistro 5 (Restaurant Week!)
